code: var deepMap=function deepMap(obj,fn){var deepMapper=function deepMapper(val){return isObject(val)?deepMap(val,fn):fn(val);};if(Array.isArray(obj)){return obj.map(deepMapper);}if(isObject(obj)){return mapObject(obj,deepMapper);}return obj;};var mapObject=function mapObject(obj,fn){return Object.keys(obj).reduce(function(res,key){res[key]=fn(obj[key]);return res;},{});};var isObject=function isObject(myVar){return myVar&&typeof myVar==='object';};export default deepMap;
